item.description:
Genetown Career Fair
When: Monday, November 1, 2010, 9:00 am - 5:00 pm
Where: Cambridge Center Marriott
Two Cambridge Center
Cambridge, MA 02142
Website: biospace.com
BioSpace Life Science Career Fairs are the biotech industryâ€™s premier career events. Featuring well-respected employers from around the nation, those job fairs attract top candidates in the biotech, pharmaceutical, life science and medical device industries. With such a great number of recruiters and hiring managers from top biotech companies attending those career fairs, there are an abundance of opportunities available for job seekers. Many different disciplines within the industry are represented bringing a diversity of candidates. The Massachusetts Life Sciences Center is a partnering organization with Genetown.
item.name: Genetown Career Fair
